subject: Baseball
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: Since purchasing the Cubs in 2009, the Ricketts family has been pushing for a renovation of Wrigley Field. A deal has yet to be completed and resentment is on the rise.
snippet: Since purchasing the Cubs in 2009, the Ricketts family has been pushing for a renovation of Wrigley Field. A deal has yet to be completed and resentment is on the rise.
